comments.body: @zikalino  should we keep this in output? or keep both format, which makes the output body big

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +292,296 @@            results = self.list_all()

        self.results['ansible_facts']['azure_networkinterfaces'] = self.serialize_nics(results)
        self.results['networkinterfaces'] = self.to_dict_list(results)
        return self.results
